title: Plan Unidirectional Flushing Program
description: A water quality engineer is planning a unidirectional flushing program to clean water mains and improve water quality in a specific neighborhood.

tasks.description: Using a hydraulic model, design a flushing sequence (which valves and hydrants to open/close) that will achieve the necessary scouring velocity in the pipes.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates an optimized, step-by-step flushing plan.

tasks.description: Create work orders for the field crews based on the flushing plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a series of linked work orders for the crews.

tasks.description: Generate notifications for the affected customers, letting them know about the potential for temporary discolored water.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a customer notification list and message.
